title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When attempting to use the JavaScript date object with the value '3/2/2005' as a filter in a table, an error message is displayed.
OB: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The table filter should accept the date value '3/2/2005' without throwing any error messages.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the table with the filter option enabled. 
2. Input the value '3/2/2005' in the filter field and press Enter. 
3. Observe the error message that appears.
